name: rabexf
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wcel(crab(s0, c0, w0), universe), wcel(c0, c1))
stmt.pretty: ax-mp({ s0 ∈ c0 | w0 } ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wcel(crab(s0, c0, w0), universe)
-| wcel(c0, c1)
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(crab(s0, c0, w0), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(crab(s0, c0, w0), universe)
-| wcel(c0, c1)
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(crab(s0, c0, w0), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(crab(s0, c0, w0), universe))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(crab(s0, c0, w0), universe)
-| wcel(c0, c1)
-| wnfc(s0, c0)

comment: Separation Scheme in terms of a restricted class abstraction. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
